text: Margot Adler (April 16, 1946 â€“ July 28, 2014) was an American author, journalist, lecturer, Wiccan priestess and radio journalist. She was a New York correspondent for National Public Radio (NPR).NPR Website Adler died from endometrial cancer in her New York City home, aged 68. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Educators from Arkansas Category:American esotericists Category:American radio personalities Category:Deaths from endometrial cancer Category:Occultists Category:Journalists from Arkansas Category:Writers from Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Priests
